description: List of transactions wrapped in an object containing some other attributes normalized away form the transactions themselves
title: Transactions Wrapper

___name.description: Immutable name of the app emitting this event

___version.description: Version of the app emitting this event

$eref.description: Data captured by an agent representing an event occurring in a monitored app

___name.description: Generic designation of a transaction in the scope of a single app (eg: 'GET /users/:id')

___timestamp.description: Recorded time of the transaction, UTC based and formatted as YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ

___type.description: Keyword of specific relevance in the app's domain (eg: 'request', 'cache', etc)

___duration.description: How long the transaction took to complete, in ms with 3 decimal points

___id.description: UUID for the transaction, referred by its traces

___result.description: The result of the transaction. HTTP status code for HTTP-related transactions.

___platform.description: Name of the system platform the agent is running on.

___architecture.description: Architecture of the system the agent is running on.

___hostname.description: Hostname of the system the agent is running on.
